Package main

Class Quiz

java.lang.Object
main.Quiz
All Implemented Interfaces:
Listable
public class Quiz extends Object implements Listable
A quiz, which contains an arraylist of questions along with various attributes of the quiz

Each quiz contains all the necessary attributes of a quiz, along with getters and setters for each , so they can be used

Version:
11/14/21
Author:
Liam Kelly
See Also:
QuizManager

  • Method Details

    • generateUniqueQuestionId

      public int generateUniqueQuestionId()
      Creates a unique ID for a new question

      Gets the largest id from the list and adds 1 to ensure the id is unique

      Returns:
      max - a unique id for a new question object

      Returns id of the quiz

      id - quiz-specific identifier

      public void setScrambled​(boolean scrambled)
      Sets quiz scrambled boolean
      Parameters:
      scrambled - - whether the teacher wants the quiz questions to be in random order

    • isScrambled

      public boolean isScrambled()
      Returns true if the quiz needs to be scrambled
      Returns:
      scrambled - whether the quiz questions should be in random order

    • scrambleQuestions

      public void scrambleQuestions()
      Randomized the order of questions in the questions arrayList

      Will be called in the UI before displaying the quiz for an individual instance, to ensure questions are ordered differently between students

    • getListName

      public String getListName()
      Returns the name of the quiz
      Specified by:
